about_the_game:
Genesis is a controller exclusive next generation online-competitive MOBA. Utilizing Unreal 4 Engine, it boasts stunning graphics and smooth control. Genesis differentiates from classic MOBA games by opting for joystick control which is highly optimized and extremely intuitive. Set in a futuristic sci-fi world where gods and men clash to claim dominion, players can experience the joy of Genesis in its PVP or PVE game modes. The game will initially feature a rich roster of 30 heroes and a wide selection of hero, weapon and item cosmetics. Genesis is slated to be published on PC and PS4 in the spring of 2019.
